name: Riddles of the old sage
description:
The riddles of the old sage are a great way to spend your free time! Test your knowledge and learn a lot!
The game is made in a popular style, you need to guess the hidden word by placing the letters in the cells in the correct order, adding the desired word. In the beginning, simple riddles are waiting for you, but with increasing level their complexity will increase. Solve complex puzzles you will help three types of tips: open one correct letter, remove all the wrong letters and open the entire word. You can use hints for the inside of the game currency. In our game it is convenient to play anywhere, because it does not take much time. Is there a free minute? Guess a few words and move to a new level. Go back to the game later, the progress of the passage is saved automatically.

Offers:
- Over 1000 conceived words in two languages
- Beautiful, fabulous graphics
- Complex puzzles
- Unique sound series
- The ability to learn new words and their meanings
- A good way to test your intelligence
- A great way of spending time
